transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ha bol.
Executive: Ha ji, ha ji sir, Shraddha baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART team se.
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Ji ji, actually sir abhi hum over the video meet connect kar sakte hain?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To hum ek bar sath mein dekh lete hain ki kya leads aapko aa rahi hai us jo video meet rahegi na, usme mere senior bhi connect rahenge. Okay?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To easy rahega, hum log bhi samajh payenge aur aage bhi hum kaisa kya aapko business provide karna hai wo discuss kar sakte hain. Hai na?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: To aap mujhe mail ID bataiye kis mail ID pe aapko link share karna hai sir?
Customer: Mail ID dena, dena.
Executive: Mail ID bataiye ye jo aapki IndiaMART wali jo mail ID hai usi pe share kar du? S se jo start hai.
Customer: [inaudible] batao.
Executive: Meeting ka link share karu kya sir?
Customer: Meeting ka link.
Executive: Ha abhi share karu aapko?
Customer: Karo.
Executive: Ek second, check kariyega mail mail pe Shraddha ki taraf se mail aaya hoga aapko.
Customer: Mera ki ye kam mera ki ye complete kya mera bolte ho. Haan. Mera mera lead ye bhi Telangana mein lead chahiye mera chahiye.
Executive: Samajh rahi hu mai, concern aapka sun liya hai maine sir. Ek bar aap join kariye meeting ko, hai na? Detail mein ek bar dekh lete hain lead ka kya issue aa raha hai basically.
Executive: Waha pe dekhiye join ka option aa raha hoga, join kariye.
Executive: Dekhiye join with Google Meet ka option aa raha hai aapko?
Customer: Ek second. Isme WhatsApp mein aata hai ye?
Executive: Nahi nahi, mail ID open kariye.
Customer: Ek minute.
Executive: WhatsApp pe share karu kya?
Customer: Haan WhatsApp se share karo, usme bhi check kiye.
Executive: Check kariye maine aapko WhatsApp pe bhi share kiya hai.
Executive: Waha pe dekhiye video call link likh ke aa raha hoga na sir?
Customer: Pin puch raha hai na?
Executive: Video call jo link hai wo blue colour mein dikh raha hai aapko?
Customer: Ha dikh raha hai lekin open kare to nahi raha hai. Ek minute mera phone number. Kya aa raha hai wo?
Customer: 87 ye pin code bata raha hai.
Executive: Rukiye dobara se dusra bhejungi ek second rukiye.
Customer: Haan. Video call to aa raha.
Executive: Haan aaya hai dekhiye.
Executive: Dekhiye join ka option aa raha hai. The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
Executive: Sir mic allow kariyega.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.

Customer: Hello?
Customer: Join ho raha hai isme?
Customer: Haan hello.
Executive: Haan ji sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Aa rahi aa rahi. Haan waha pe join jab kariye.
Executive: Na to mic ko allow kariyega waha pe. Mai ye bol rahi hu jab aap join karoge na sir to waha pe jo mic ka option aata hai na mic ko allow kariyega aap waha pe.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.

Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.

Executive: The person you are speaking with has put your call on hold. Please stay on the line.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs leads in Telangana.

- Customer unable to join meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to connect over video meet.

- Executive shared meeting link on mail and WhatsApp.

- Executive guided customer to allow mic.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, video meet, technical issue
